trans-unit.source: With the members of the <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" /> namespace, you can programmatically create grammars that comply with the W3C <see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761">Speech Recognition Grammar Specification Version 1.0</see> (SRGS).
trans-unit.target: Com os membros do namespace <see cref="N:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar" />, você pode criar programaticamente gramáticas em conformidade com o W3C <see href="http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761">Especificação de Gramática de Reconhecimento de Fala Versão 1.0</see> (SRGS).

trans-unit.source: To create an SRGS grammar programmatically, you construct an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance and add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma gramática SRGS programaticamente, você pode criar um vazio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instância e adicionar instâncias de classes que representam elementos SRGS.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> classes represent elements defined in the SRGS specification.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> classes representam elementos definidos na especificação SRGS.

trans-unit.source: Some of the properties of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> class represent attributes in the SRGS specification, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Algumas das propriedades do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> classe representam os atributos na especificação SRGS, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A>.

trans-unit.source: See [SRGS Grammar XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b888942f-637c-4243-b49f-1fbb6c12d9f1) for a reference to the elements and attributes of the SRGS specification as supported by System.Speech.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [SRGS gramática XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b888942f-637c-4243-b49f-1fbb6c12d9f1) para obter uma referência para os elementos e atributos da especificação SRGS Speech com suporte.

trans-unit.source: To add a grammar rule to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> class.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar uma regra de gramática para uma <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, use o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Add%2A> método o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the text within an SRGS element using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> instance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar o texto dentro de um elemento SRGS usando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> instância.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> class, you can optimize recognition of phrases in a grammar by specifying subsets of a complete phrase that will be allowed to constitute a match, and by selecting a matching mode from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> classe, você pode otimizar o reconhecimento de frases em uma gramática especificando subconjuntos de uma frase completa que terão permissão para constituir uma correspondência e selecionando um modo de correspondência do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [criar gramáticas usando SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) no [guia de programação de fala de sistema para o .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) para obter mais informações e exemplos.

trans-unit.source: You can also construct <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instances from existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar files, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode construir <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instâncias dos arquivos de Gramática SRGS compatível com XML existentes, de uma instância do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, ou de uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> class to prepare completed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objects for consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os métodos do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> classe preparar concluída <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objetos para consumo pelo mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala.

trans-unit.source: Grammars created with members of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace can be used by constructors of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> class to create <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: Gramáticas criadas com membros de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace pode ser usado por construtores do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> classe para criar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objetos.
